title: Healthcare Practical Competency Enhancement: Instructional Design Team Collaboration for Open Educational Resource Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and basic digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Through collaborative instructional design teamwork, learners can execute the open educational resources (OER) design process step-by-step.
Based on learner needs analysis, learners can draft customized OER content for mathematics.
Through team-based prototyping and feedback incorporation, learners can enhance OER completeness by at least 80%.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
